reviews.sentence: Good location. Good location good and helpful staff. Needs renovation in some areas.
Night on Orchard. Good size room and great breakfast. Rooms are very tired. Could Benoit from a spruce up. Bit far from the downtown area.

Busy hotel ok location. We travelled with 3 adults and 2 children. The hotel policy is maximum room capacity 2 adults 1 child but my 2 children easily could have fit in the enormous king size bed with my husband and I We had an interconnecting room with my mother that had 2 single beds. The hotel has a dated feel to it. While it is on Orchard Rd it is at the top end and I felt we were having to walk a lot to go anywhere. We did not eat at the hotel we chose to eat breakfast across the road in the mornings and other meals while we were exploring Singapore so I can not comment on their food. Next door is a shopping centre which has some interesting patrons at night. These patrons can be found loitering in the mornings and are shooed by police quite quickly. There is a large pool but it really looks neglected. There is a tiny kids playroom that the kids will get bored with in 10 minutes. I would choose a hotel more central on Orchard Rd next time or somewhere with a updated feel to it.

Good but needs updating. Good hotel but rooms and corridors look a bit dated Good location for shopaholics and plenty of bars and restaurants. good selection for breakfast. Friendly staff. Good location for shopaholics and plenty of bars and restaurants Some days long wait for taxis. rooms and corridors need updating. View from window on 7th floor was non existant.

Apples and Pears at the Orchard. My wife and I have recently stayed twice at the Orchard with varying degrees of satisfaction but also some concern. First the staff are extremely helpful and friendly and were on hand to assist with our every need on both occasions of our stays. However there appears to be a need for some modernisation in the plumbing of certain bathrooms with odious vapours emanating from some drainsthis was dealt with by the staff to there best ability and upon our second stay in a different room all was well. The overall ambience of the hotel was delightful with small touches of orchid flowers on the bar tables. Perhaps they should rename it the Orchid Hotel.
Fair cleanliness. Old fashion decoration so some facility some useful some not canot useBreakfast and Manage of Breakfast not recommend due to renovate.
Hua Ting restaurant was very nice. Rooms comfortable. Was undergoing renovations so a little noisy.

Should wait for reno to be done if you have other choice. Staff were friendly at Club and helpful however upon arrival bellman did not have enough ma power. one bell man open cab for us but ask us to push our heavy suites case by our selves to reception. Of course I rejected and ask hi to help us. but he was talking him self saying I am alone and not enough people. Hey we are not here to do you guys job. Also rooms were not ready at 2pm. even 1 room was not ready at 2 pm when we booked 2 rooms. Also they are under renovation still and will be till Mid 2019. our both rooms were not yet renovated. I did not expected to be such lousy quality room for Premier Club room even though they were not renovated yet. mouldy ceiling and water leaking from shower space to floor where basins and mirrors are. it is so slippery and so dangerous. I could see lousy touch up of silicon caulking in bath room everywhere too. the glass shelve in closet has so much dust and we could see house keeping never wipe it for very long.

Great location for convenient specially with the supermarket at lower ground. Initially I asked for connecting room as we came with a disabled child but never received any update on this it would be great if I made aware of it much earlier rather finding it out on that day itself so at least I know what to expect. Overall experience very good.
Fair. Customer service. Bathroom ned​ repair the tiles surrounding the wall vanity counter top also.

Excellent location. Premiere room is spacious. Clean and recently updated room. Better if toilet has a bidet. Staff Ms Tina manages the buffet breakfast well. Relished the assorted food with Eastern and Western cuisine. Friendly hotel staff. Fast Wifi Best location close to shopping malls. Will stay here again and recommend this hotel to friends.

Hotel located centrally located with attentive friendly staff. Great location and the hotel just received a renovation. Rooms are ideal for the business traveler and staff at Orchard Hotel is very attentive and friendly. The staff was very helpful throughout our stay and speedy as well to provide solutions and recommendations. I used the Premier Lounge facilities and the team there led by Daisy Thomas and Shahar made our stay seamless and comfortable. They anticipated our needs and were a constant help to our group. Choi Yen from the front office was also incredibly helpful and made the check in and stay experience a great one. Will be staying again at Orchard Hotel Singapore soon.

Back Home. Once again back to the Orchard. Welcomed like long lost family. Took my family and grand daughters 3 6 who were welcomed at the taxi by Yen and Quam as if they were visiting Royalty. The Premier Club Daisy and the irrepressible Rita looked after them with tolerance and grace during their visit. When my daughter injured her ankle Shah without asking immediately sources a bandage and wrapped it. Above and beyond service. Rooms still to a superb standard with value for money probably the best in Singapore. Some hotel upgrades and revamps completed and the new GM Jean Philipe planning more. A great hotel looks to be getting even better. The front staff are still working like bees and from what I observed checkin lines are usually very short. Orchard road shopping and abundant food outlets within a short walk.

Good location. Situated along one end of busy Orchard Road Orchard Hotel has recently undergone a major facelift and now looks modern and timeless. Step into the lobby and be greeted by the iconic clock tower. What we loved most were the 2 AURA Automated Room Service Associates in the lobby. The AURA is a robot that delivers room amenities to guests. This is a great initiative by the hotel. The ballroom is one of the largest pillar free ballrooms and they have done away with those old banquet chairs which almost every hotel uses. Location is great being on the Orchard Road belt at the heart of the retail scene. 2 km away is the UNESCO World Heritage Site the Singapore Botanic Gardens which is well worth a visit.

Above expectations. Newly renovated good facilities and excelebr fixtures amazing stay. Probably best breakfast in town. Optimal place for business or leisure. Easy to get to places excellent location and very friendly staff. Can t fault this place at all. Congrats Will be back. Mourad Esafi.

Some Betterment. I have stayed at the Orchard on and off for the last 15 years. The hotel is changing and many of the more attractive attributes are being lost. I suppose that is modernization in action. The Signature Suites remain the my favorite rooms although the business lounge on the 18th floor of the older wing is now closed and the new lounge is a disappointment in my opinion. Check in has improved in the last few years and the new restaurant in the lobby is awesome. The Breakfast buffet is probably the best I have experienced in Singapore. I wish I could say the same about room service I ordered and receive the worst 30 Hamburger in recent memory and the Caesar Salad was practically unrecognizable but not entirely uneatable. All combined however the Hotel still has allot to offer at good value and I suspect I will be returning.

Professional Helpful Staff. Held an event and stayed there for one night for work purpose. The hotel had just being renovated and I love the atmosphere and design of the lobby and room. Most impressed by the dedicated and professional team who had helped me during the event especially Ms Elen Wong from Catering Events Mr Nelson Wang from Guest Experience and Mr Kevin Tan from Banquet Operations. They had demonstrated great patience and attended to my urgent request when necessary. Overall had a very nice experience at the hotel whether for work or leisure. Last but not least I like their breakfast selection.

Love the Durian Pengat. Great food and service. Convenient location. The hotel is newly renovated and everything looks fresh and new. Great ambience for dining with your friends family colleagues. Will definitely come back again.
Exceptional. Newly renovated room bed very comfortable big room.
Rooms are modern spacious and clean especially after renovations. Food is good with excellent selections at breakfast buffet. A little bit far from Orchard MRT 300 m or 10 minute walk.
